StringTable.Label: Retribution_Mission1_Dec
StringTable.String: The Thalan Ambassador has revealed prophecies that claim humanity will soon cause the destruction of the galaxy. D.L. Bradley, concerned with this information, has dispatched a small fleet to investigate a lost Precursor prison world and find proof of the upcoming Apocalypse.

StringTable.Label: Retribution_Mission1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The Thalan Ambassador has revealed prophecies that claim humanity will soon cause the destruction of the galaxy. D.L. Bradley, concerned with this information, has dispatched a small fleet to investigate a lost Precursor prison world and find proof of the upcoming Apocalypse.

StringTable.Label: Retribution_Mission2_Dec
StringTable.String: D.L. Bradley has dispatched Colonel Casey to Altaria to locate the Last Shard of the Telenanth. Unfortunately, the Yor have already occupied Altaria, and begun fortifying the sector.

StringTable.Label: Retribution_Mission2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: D.L. Bradley has dispatched Colonel Casey to Altaria to locate the Last Shard of the Telenanth. Unfortunately, the Yor have already occupied Altaria, and begun fortifying the sector.

StringTable.Label: Retribution_Mission2_RetrieveShard_Message
StringTable.String: Retrieve the Shard of the Mithrilar

StringTable.Label: Retribution_Mission3_Dec
StringTable.String: Colonel Jenna Casey has secured the Last Shard of the Telenanth. Now she must reach the First Fleet and convince D.L. Bradley to use the Shard to neutralize the power of the Bane, before it is too late.

StringTable.Label: Retribution_Mission3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Colonel Jenna Casey has secured the Last Shard of the Telenanth. Now she must reach the First Fleet and convince D.L. Bradley to use the Shard to neutralize the power of the Bane, before it is too late.

StringTable.Label: Retribution_Mission3_GettoHypergate_Message
StringTable.String: Get the Shard to the Hypergate

StringTable.Label: Retribution_Mission4_Dec
StringTable.String: The final battle has begun at Drengi. Colonel Jenna Casey must reach D.L. Bradley in his powerful T.A.S. Crusader, once there she must convince him of the doom that awaits them all should he continue down this path. Only then will they be able to pacify the Bane with the Shard of the Telenanth and end this destructive cycle.

StringTable.Label: Retribution_Mission4_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The final battle has begun at Drengi. Colonel Jenna Casey must reach D.L. Bradley in his powerful T.A.S. Crusader, once there she must convince him of the doom that awaits them all should he continue down this path. Only then will they be able to pacify the Bane with the Shard of the Telenanth and end this destructive cycle.
